alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Elmore and central Owyhee Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hinton Reservoir, or 28 miles southwest of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hinton Reservoir around 330 PM MDT. Grand View, Mountain Home Air Force Base, C J Strike Dam and C J Strike Reservoir around 340 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
